lead_paragraph: With N.F.L. training camps under way, fans await the fate of the Giants’ Antonio Pierce and the possible return of the Ravens’ Derrick Mason and discuss LenDale White’s hold-the-tequila diet.
snippet: With N.F.L. training camps under way, fans await the fate of the Giants’ Antonio Pierce and the possible return of the Ravens’ Derrick Mason and discuss LenDale White’s hold-the-tequila diet.
